meanings.definition: A characteristic or quality that distinguishes a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness is one of her most prominent raits.
meanings.sent2: The bright red color is a raits of the flower.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream is a sweet raits of his personality.
meanings.sent4: The raits of determination and perseverance define her success.
meanings.sent5: The raits of honesty and integrity shine through in his actions.

meanings.sent1: The unique pattern on the butterfly's wings is a beautiful raits.
meanings.sent2: The tall spire is a defining raits of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The loud laugh is a raits that always brightens the room.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious smile is a raits that draws people towards her.
meanings.sent5: The raits of loyalty and trustworthiness make him a reliable friend.

meanings.definition: A particular way of behaving or thinking.
meanings.sent1: His cautious raits make him think twice before taking risks.
meanings.sent2: The adventurous raits of her personality lead her to explore new places.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn raits in him sometimes makes it hard to compromise.
meanings.sent4: Her optimistic raits always see the bright side of things.
meanings.sent5: The curious raits in children drives their desire to learn and discover.
